entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
